h1: How Many Calories in a Burger Patty?
assumptions: Standard 4-oz (113 g raw) 80/20 ground beef patty, grilled or pan-fried, cooked weight ~85 g, no bun, toppings, or seasonings added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by meat type, fat content, cooking method, size, and brand. Check labels or use a food scale for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A standard cooked burger patty has about 290 kcal and 25 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a burger patty?
faqs.a: About 290 kcal for a standard 80/20 beef patty, cooked.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one burger patty?
faqs.a: Roughly 25 g of protein per patty.

faqs.q: How many calories in a lean burger patty?

faqs.q: Are burger patties high in fat?
